queries: What are the main features of the system?
How does the authentication process work?
reference_answers: The system includes user management, data processing, and reporting features. It supports real-time analytics and automated workflows.
The authentication process uses OAuth 2.0 with JWT tokens. Users must provide valid credentials and complete two-factor authentication.
The system requires Python 3.8+, PostgreSQL 12+, and at least 4GB RAM. It also needs network connectivity for external APIs.
Database configuration involves setting up connection parameters, creating tables, and configuring backup schedules.
Security measures include encryption at rest, SSL/TLS for data in transit, role-based access control, and regular security audits.
relevant_docs: The system includes user management, data processing, and reporting features.
It supports real-time analytics and automated workflows.
Key features include dashboard customization and export capabilities.
The authentication process uses OAuth 2.0 with JWT tokens.
Users must provide valid credentials and complete two-factor authentication.
Session management includes automatic timeout and refresh mechanisms.
The system requires Python 3.8+, PostgreSQL 12+, and at least 4GB RAM.
It also needs network connectivity for external APIs.
Additional requirements include Docker and Kubernetes for deployment.
Database configuration involves setting up connection parameters.
Creating tables and configuring backup schedules is essential.
Performance tuning includes index optimization and query caching.
Security measures include encryption at rest and SSL/TLS for data in transit.
Role-based access control and regular security audits are implemented.
Additional security features include intrusion detection and logging.
